items.ja: 'I understand their anger' - Edwards on Wolves fans' boos
items.en: 'I understand their anger' - Edwards on Wolves fans' boos
items.text_for_match: 'I understand their anger' - Edwards on Wolves fans' boos Wolverhampton Wanderers manager Rob Edwards says he can understand some of the anger fans have with the club following their 4-1 defeat at home to Manchester United. Wolverhampton Wanderers manager Rob Edwards says he can understand some of the anger fans have with the club following their 4-1 defeat at home to Manchester United.

items.ja: 'It was handball, wasn't it?' - why Rutter goal against West Ham stood
items.en: 'It was handball, wasn't it?' - why Rutter goal against West Ham stood
items.text_for_match: 'It was handball, wasn't it?' - why Rutter goal against West Ham stood Georginio Rutter's late equaliser in Brighton's 1-1 draw with West Ham on Sunday was allowed to stand despite handball claims. items.ja: 'Disrespectful' Salah comments threw club under bus - Rooney
items.en: 'Disrespectful' Salah comments threw club under bus - Rooney
items.text_for_match: 'Disrespectful' Salah comments threw club under bus - Rooney Wayne Rooney says the critical comments made by Mohamed Salah after Liverpool's 3-3 draw with Leeds were "disrespectful" and have thrown the club "under the bus". items.text_for_match: 'Phenomenal' Wharton pivotal to Palace win at Fulham - Hitzlsperger Match of the Day's Thomas Hitzlsperger and Shay Given praise Crystal Palace midfielder Adam Wharton's skill and intelligence in the Eagles 2-1 victory over Fulham. items.ja: Fiorentina take security measures after threats
items.en: Fiorentina take security measures after threats
items.text_for_match: Fiorentina take security measures after threats Fiorentina say they have taken security measures to protect players, staff and their families after they receive "unacceptable and shameful" threats.
